title: OBS: Toggle Webcam

title: Send Keybind
description:
Sends a keystroke to the operating system.
Useful for toggling mute on Discord or similar tasks.
label: Keyboard

BUNDECK_KEYS.description: Keycodes to send. You can view a list of keycodes here.
BUNDECK_KEYS.label: Key Codes
